src:
Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Gresyia/Rahayu Terhenti, Jojo Melaju
06 Nov 2019, 17:15 by Danang Sundoro



Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Gresyia/Rahayu Terhenti, Jojo Melaju



Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019: Gresyia/Rahayu Terhenti, Jojo Melaju


KBRN, Fuzhou : Ganda Putri Indonesia Greysia Polii/Apriyani Rahayu secara mengejutkan terhenti di babak pertama Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhoi China Open 2019 di Haixia, Olympic Sports Center, Rabu (6/11/2019) sore.Pasangan unggulan keenam putri Indonesia, Gresyia/Rahayu mengakui ketangguhan Malaysia, Chow Mei Kuan/Lee Meng Yean. dengan skor 19-21, 16-21.Tampil seperti tidak biasanya, Greysia/Apriyani bermain dalam kontrol pasangan Malaysia Chow/Lee dan tidak dapat keluar dari tekanan. “Penampilan kami benar-benar under perform, sangat mengecewakan dan jauh dari harapan. Di pertandingan tadi, aura untuk menangnya nggak dapet,” ujar Greysia usai pertandingan dalam keterangan tertulis kepada Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Rabu (6/11/2019) Sore.BACA JUGA : Tommy Terhenti di Bulutangkis Fuzhou China Open 2019“Pasangan Malaysia punya pertahanan yang rapat, mereka pemain yang ulet. Tidak mudah juga menembus pertahanan mereka,” jelas Apriyani melihat penampilan sang lawan asal Malaysia.“Pastinya kami akan ada usaha untuk memperbaiki diri, kita lihat saja dalam tiga bulan ke depan. Mudah-mudahan kami bisa mengatasinya,” sebut Greysia.Dengan hasil ini, maka nomor ganda putri belum berhasil mengirim wakil ke babak kedua. BACA JUGA : Fuzhou China Open 2019, Jordan/Melati Melaju ke Babak KeduaSelanjutnya, sektor tunggal putra yang mempertemukan dua pebulutangkis terbaik Indonesia, Jonatan Christie melawan Shesar Hiren Rhustavito di babak pertama Turnamen Bulutangkis Fuzhoi China Open 2019 berakhir dengan skor 21-18,  21-17, Rabu (6/11/2019) Sore.
text:
Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Gresia / Rahayu Stopped, Jojo Drove
Nov 6 2019, 17:15 by Danang Sundoro



Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Gresia / Rahayu Stopped, Jojo Drove



Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019: Gresia / Rahayu Stopped, Jojo Drove


KBRN, Fuzhou: Indonesian Women's Doubles Greysia Polii / Apriyani Rahayu surprisingly stopped in the first round of the 2019 Fuzhoi China Open Badminton Tournament at Haixia, Olympic Sports Center, Wednesday (11/06/2019) afternoon. Indonesian sixth seeded pair, Gresyia / Rahayu acknowledging the toughness of Malaysia, Chow Mei Kuan / Lee Meng Yean. with a score of 19-21, 16-21. Appearing as usual, Greysia / Apriyani played in the control of Malaysian pair Chow / Lee and could not get out of the pressure. "Our performance is really under-performing, very disappointing and far from expectations. In the match earlier, the aura to win was not able to get, "said Greysia after the match in a written statement to Radio Republik Indonesia (RRI), Wednesday (11/06/2019) Afternoon. READ ALSO: Tommy Stopped at Badminton Fuzhou China Open 2019" Malaysian Couple have tight defense, they are tough players. It is not easy to penetrate their defenses, "explained Apriyani looking at the appearance of the Malaysian opponent." Certainly we will have an effort to improve ourselves, we will see in the next three months. Hopefully we can overcome it, "said Greysia. With this result, the women's doubles number has not succeeded in sending representatives to the second round. READ ALSO: Fuzhou China Open 2019, Jordan / Melati Advancing to the Second Round of 2019 Next, the men's singles sector that brought together the two best Indonesian badminton players, Jonatan Christie against Shesar Hiren Rhustavito in the first round of the Chinese Open Fuzhoi Badminton 2019 ended with a score of 21-18, 21- 17, Wednesday (11/06/2019) Evening.
